Articles.Content: While patching KSP, the patcher ran into an error. I figured: Ok... Lets just play the game and not patch... Well, the game loaded smoothly, then it got to the ion engine. And then it froze. I don't remember the specific error (The patcher refuses to work now for some reason ), so I got nothing. Help would be gladly accepted. -A person just trying to play KSP.
